headline: Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Fortinet, Inc. on StockOpine’s Newsletter’s Substack by StockOpine. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on FTNT. Fortinet, Inc.’s share was trading at $82.94 as of December 2nd. FTNT’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.67 and 28.01 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Fortinet, Inc. provides cybersecurity and convergence of […]
